note.p: Education: Wittenberg. MPhil (1696); MD. Leipzig; Jena; Altdorf

Career: Taught philosophy privately at Wittenberg; Professor of Medicine, Wittenberg (1709-1713); Personal Physician and Counsellor to August II, King of Poland; Superintendent of the King's library and natural history and art collections; founded botanical gardens at Wittenberg
Notes: Proposed by George Lewis Teissier; Sir Hans Sloane; a Secretary
